New Records: CJ McCollum scored 38 points, tying his career-high with 38 points in a game
Key Match Events: Jordan Hawkins buried a three-pointer in the third quarter for a 70-67 lead
Dejounte Murray made a key three-pointer
CJ McCollum buried a three-pointer in the fourth and made a 12-foot step-back jumper to seal the win
Pre-Game Insights: Zion Williamson was suspended for one game due to repeated lateness to practices or flights
Herb Jones was also sidelined indefinitely with a posterior labrum tear in his right shoulder
Joel Embiid missed his third straight game due to a sprained left foot
Post-Match Reflections: Pelicans snapped a two-game losing streak and won for only the third time since Dec. 7
76ers are struggling without Joel Embiid, going 8-15 this season
The game was a crucial step toward the championship for the Pelicans
Miscellaneous Highlights: CJ McCollum hit six 3s and made 13 of 24 shots overall from the floor
Pelicans play at Boston on Sunday, and 76ers visit Orlando next
